author: Meagan Clark
title: Closing Doors Is Boosting Church Attendance, But Can Online Activity Stem Christianity's Decline?
description: Stay-at-home orders will test whether churches can draw worshippers back inside their doors when it's safe to do so again—or speed their decline.
content:
This story is being co-published with Religion Unplugged.
When Tate Spring Baptist Church canceled its in-person services to combat the coronavirus in Arlington, Texas, Pastor Curtis James wanted to re-create a weekly Bible study for the kids in his ministry… [+8106 chars]
